snippet.title: Greptile: Self-Healing AI Coding Agent With INCREDIBLE Code Context! Powerful Coding Agent!
snippet.description:
If youâ€™ve ever wished your repo could explain itself, catch subtle bugs, and even heal your codebase automatically, Greptile is the tool you need. In this video, I break down how Greptile builds a complete graph of your entire codebase, learns your patterns, reviews your PRs with context, catches edge-case bugs, and even gives confidence scores so you know exactly whatâ€™s safe to merge. This is the closest thing to a true AI software engineer working beside you.
